礟字的基本解释

礟
pào
古同“炮3”。

礟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［pào］
［《集韻》披教切，去效，滂。］
亦作“礟1”。亦作“礮1”。
(1)兵器的一种。本是用来发射石弹的机械装置，后发展成为金属管状火器，用火药发射金属弹头。
(2)炮石。
(3)炮击。
(4)爆竹的简称。参见“砲粲”。
(5)方言。量词。多用于成堆成捆的东西。

礟字的康熙字典解释

【備考】【午集】【石字部】　礟； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页838第05
【篇海類編】同礮。

礟
Basic explanation of words
礟
pào
Gu Tong "Cannon 3".
礟
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［pào］
["Jiyun" teaches cutting, to be effective, punishing. ]
Also known as "礟1". Also known as "礮1".
(1) A type of weapon. Originally a mechanical device used to launch stone bullets, it later developed into a metal tubular firearm, which used gunpowder to launch a metal warhead.
(2) Gunstone.
(3) Shelling.
(4) The abbreviation for firecrackers. See "Cannon Can".
(5) Dialects. quantifier. Mostly used for things in piles and bundles.
礟
